4.2: Search the Amount in the Payment Amount section > Match the date and payer to find the required transaction
4.2.1: If you find EOB & 835 File for Required transaction: go to step 4.3
4.2.3: If you don't find the EOB & 835 File, update spreadsheet
4.3: Download 835 file: Select Options 835(5010) in the dropdown and then click Download button
4.3.1: Download EOB: Select option PDF in the dropdown and then click Download
